group_1.narration: This is all pieced together from@what I heard after the incident...
It seems Hazuki was looking for the source of@of the rumors about us with Momoko Togame.
However...

group_1.textCenter: But the more I looked into the rumor, the@more vague it got.
Then our main lead suddenly vanished.
Anyway...it was obviously a load of junk@since the start.
The way I figure, the real culprit just made@up the rumor as a distraction.
A Witch would never be able to pull off@something that complex.
So like we thought, it's gotta be a@deliberate plot by someone...

group_1.narration: Yes...@Eventually we realized.
Whoever it was, they were @bearing down on us.

group_1.textLeft: A lot has happened, and there were@almost additional complications...

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry. Because I lost control of myself@back there...

group_1.textLeft: Neither Rena nor Kaede had anything to do@with it. Neither did I.
There wasn't a trace of their magic.

group_1.textRight: And of course I didn't attack her either.

group_1.textLeft: So that means whoever did it was nowhere@near us...
I hate to admit it, but I didn't manage to @find any clues this time either.

group_1.textRight: Yes... We will find the culprit!

group_1.narration: The suspicious figure creeping@in the shadows is still out there.
Same with the visions I saw...@What even were they?
The visions definitely affected me mentally@and I didn't even realize it.@That culminated in me deciding @everyone else was an enemy...
I haven't had those visions since...@I warned Yachiyo and the others@about what had happened.
But we still don't know the truth behind it.
Everything is still a mystery...
But I did learn something...
What I learned was...

group_1.textRight: [se:7201_detect_magic][chara:301100:effect_ef_adv_01]Ah, my Soul Gem's reacting to something!@Nanaka!

group_1.textLeft: All right, Kako will accompany Akira. As for@Meiyui and myself...

group_1.textRight: Yikes! They left us in the dust!

group_1.textCenter: Hee hee! Off we go, go, go!

group_1.narration: There are many Witches in this city...
And there are Magical Girls to hunt them.
Indeed...we all share that same fate.
That same burden...
You know, Director...@I think we may have found it.
The three of us may have@found our new Azalea House...
It's right here.
